long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing our game-changing chrome extension - the ultimate Dropshipping helper that saves your time and streamlines your product import process from Allegro/Aliexpress to Shopify/Ebay. With just a few clicks, you can COPY products from your favorite marketplace and PASTE them directly onto your Shopify or Ebay store.

Here's how it works:

Sign in to the extension
Subscribe to get started with a 3-day free trial
Head over to any Allegro or Aliexpress product page
Use the built-in chrome page translator (optional)
Click the "Copy" button on the extension
Wait for the "Copied" notification which signals that the product is ready to be pasted into Shopify
Navigate to the "Add product/listing" page on Shopify or Ebay
Click the "Paste" button on the extension
Voila! Your product is now imported to your store.
And don't worry, if you're not satisfied with our extension, canceling your subscription or trial is easy. Simply go to the asRobo extension, select Settings, then Account, and click on My Subscription. Enter your email and code to cancel your subscription.

Don't let tedious product imports slow down your dropshipping business. Try our Dropshipping helper now and streamline your product import process today!
